# Order Tesla Button
[![GitHub issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/flc995/order-tesla-button)](https://github.com/flc995/order-tesla-button/issues)
[![GitHub forks](https://img.shields.io/github/forks/flc995/order-tesla-button)](https://github.com/flc995/order-tesla-button/network)
[![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/flc995/order-tesla-button)](https://github.com/flc995/order-tesla-button/stargazers)
[![GitHub last commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/flc995/order-tesla-button)](https://github.com/flc995/order-tesla-button/commits/main)
[![View on Codepen](https://img.shields.io/badge/View-Codepen-97ca00.svg?colorA=555555&style=flat&logoWidth=14&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://codepen.io/floco/pen/MWJrKGR)

Simple animated button to order your Tesla in the blink of an eye. Animations are made using CSS transitions and jQuery

## Run
Simply open index.html in your favorite browser or click on the CodePen badge.
